Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Whether a user story is included in a given sprint

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Whether a feature is included in a release plan

Name: allocate_worker_to_task
Description: Whether a worker is assigned to a task in the sprint

Name: choose_epic_for_planning
Description: Whether an epic is selected for near-term planning

Name: set_task_effort
Description: Effort assigned to a task in hours

Name: prioritize_user_story
Description: Numeric priority assigned to a user story

Name: set_sprint_goal_target
Description: Target benefit score for the sprint goal

Name: enable_backlog_item
Description: Whether a backlog item is active for refinement

Name: staff_team_size
Description: Chosen team size for a team

Name: plan_number_of_tasks
Description: Number of tasks planned in the sprint backlog

Name: assign_scrum_master
Description: Whether a scrum master is assigned to the team

Name: select_stakeholder_for_review
Description: Whether a stakeholder is invited to the sprint review

Name: set_skill_level_target
Description: Target skill level for a given skill category
